summary: LOW TIRE PRESSURE SENSOR LIGHT REMAINS ON AT ALL TIMES, EVEN THOUGH IT APPEARS TIRES ARE INFLATED TO PROPER PRESSURE.  DIFFICULT TO DETERMINE IF THERE IS A VALID PROBLEM WITH TIRE PRESSURE - IF I IGNORE THE WARNING LIGHT AND THE TIRES REALLY ARE NOT AT CORRECT PRESSURE, I TAKE THE RISK OF HAVING A BLOW-OUT TRAVELLING AT HIGHWAY SPEEDS.
